idea:
Foodmonk Value Propositions


Foodmonk is a new kind of catering solution provider which aims to solve the real challenges faced by stakeholders (Admin/Facility manager, End Customers & Service Providers) by bringing them all together on one platform.


Our vision is to make cafeterias and messes a people driven service by enabling the end customers to contribute and share their inputs in daily decision makings,
name: FOODMONK E-COMMERCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Edugenius’ aim is to develop, implement and conduct various technology backed programs for school and college students. We believe, Learning is important for a student’s success in academics and life. The digital age is profoundly shaping the students’ learning and will also decide their future.


At Edugenius, we have multifold offerings through a website and application called ‘StudyCloud’ which provides Online education through a Website and App to the students of the school to enable anytime anywhere learning. It contains animated Multimedia syllabus based chapters; Conceptual Notes and Summaries; Doubt and Concept clarification at ones own pace; Unlimited practice tests which enable students to prepare for exams; Ability to track overall progress and access to personalized topicwise strengths and weaknesses of the students; Customizable platform to host the teachers own notes and practice tests. 


Secondly, Edugenius, through StudyCloud, aims at being an online aggregator for various local private educators, classes and institutions, giving them a platform to make their video lectures and notes available to students across the nation instead of just their locality or city. We aim to abolish the physical barriers restricting quality education reaching everyone, making it available to every student anywhere and at any time. Using StudyCloud, the students will be connected to various experts and get advice, guidance, coaching or any other support they ask from the expert.

 

Edugenius also develops and conducts various digital learning programs in schools including Interactive classrooms, Digital Library program, 3D Maths and Science labs including upgradation of educational softwares pertaining to schools. By being their continuous learning partner, we encourage the students to embrace the latest technologies to their advantage. In our day to day operations we have high potential of hiring a team of educators, content developers, engineers, resource persons, co-ordinators.
name: EDUGENIUS SOFTWARES LLP

idea: ERPL was founded in 2017, by a team from Harvard Business School and IIT Bombay. It has built a cutting edge technology based family of hardware and an Artificial Intelligence driven IoT platform ‘Sherlock’ for bringing the human touch to smart buildings. ERPL with its multi-domain knowledge in computer science, AI, electronics & mechanical HVAC systems helps Sherlock to maximize comfort while optimizing resource usage in real-time.
name: ENLITE RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
PayNext Pvt Ltd are a team of highly dedicated individuals with a passion for providing best in class payment services and a commitment to excellence. Our team consists of industry experts who have architectured and built, innovative and secure payment platforms that have contributed to the rapid growth of electronic payment channels in the country.
We are new start-up company with a highly experience team ,our objective is to become leading payment services company in India.  
We provide innovative, cost effective and comprehensive payment processing services through our multiple solutions using multiple channels viz. Point of Sale (POS), MPOS, Payment Gateway, Bharat QR & UPI (Unified Payment Interface), National Electronic Toll Collection (Acquiring) & Transit solutions (Rail & Bus).
name: PAYNEXT PVT LTD

idea:
Wise Owl Wealth Managers Pvt. Ltd. is a technology led boutique wealth management venture. It had been set up
to provide the dedicated assistance of family office to look after the gamut of Financial requirements of corporate
professionals who are at the zenith of the empire.

We aim to simplify the investment planning process by integrating all aspects of our clients’ Financial life- tax,
estate and investments.

Our purpose is not to serve our clients’ needs just once and stop at that. It would mean termination of any  propinquity, thus, developed. We believe in building a long term relationship with our clients based on trust. 

Thus, we have built our business model to provide straight forward advice for a simple fee and not on commission
or distribution fees earned from selling products like our competitors. Hence, we believe in building a higher level
of transparency and credibility with our clients.

We are on a mission to help clients take informed Financial decisions and generate better risk adjusted returns
from their savings.

Wise Owl Wealth Managers Pvt. Ltd. has its digital presence under the brand name MyWealthWiz.
name: WISE OWL WEALTH MANAGERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are leading vendors of Digital Signature Certificates . We have a tie up with Verasys, Capricon, Sify , Emudra. We provide Digital Signature Certificates of all classes.
name: www.getdigitalsign.com

idea:
Ecredify is a block chain modeled HR Tech tool which aims to eliminate old school resumes, traditional hiring/verification practices and career networking sites. We offer services across Talent Acquisition, Candidate Sourcing, Credibility Checks, Pre verifications, Exit interviews, Employee Engagement etc.
Ecredify Score: Think of CIBIL: A CIBIL score signifies an individual’s credit history. It also instills a sense of responsibility on the individual to maintain a clean financial record so that his CIBIL Score is not affected. Similarly, Ecredify Score will instill a sense of accountability in an individual/candidate/employee to maintain ethical professional behavior.
We have around 15 clients currently.
name: ECREDIFY INFORMATION TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
